Audit Report.Bug ID: V-UNI-VUL-002: Missing Range Checks on Comparison Circuits

Missing Range Checks on Comparison Circu.Short Description of the Vulnerability: Input of `LessThan(8)` is assumed to have <=8 bits, but there is no constraint for it in `LessThan` template. Attacker can use large values such as `p - 1` to trigger overflow and make something like `p - 1 < EPOCH_KEY_NONCE_PER_EPOCH` return true.
Missing Range Checks on Comparison Circu.Short Description of the Exploit: Set `nonce = -1` in `input.json` and other inputs to 0 then generate witness. No need to modify the witness.
Missing Range Checks on Comparison Circu.Proposed Mitigation: Implement range check so that attacker can't exploit overflow in `LessThan`.
